modName: No more glowing vibrant Thistle and textures
summary: This mod is exactly what the title says.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b][color=#d9ead3]This mod removes the annoying glow and brightness from plants and textures.
[/color][color=#d9ead3]It's perfect for people who use vibrant ENBs.(real vision used in screenshots)[/color]
[/b]
[/size][color=#ffe599][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8359/?]DOWNLOAD FOR SKYRIM SE[/url]
[/size][/color][size=6][b]
[color=#d9ead3]This mod edits these objects:[/color][/b][/size]
[size=3][b]Thistle[/b][/size][size=2](removes the neon bright green light and adds more realistic colors)[/size]
[b][size=3]Mountain flower[/size][/b][size=2](a small brightness and saturation fix,nothing major)[/size]
[size=3][b]Hanging Moss[/b][/size][size=2](removes the yellow shine and adds a more fresh green look to it)[/size]
[b][size=3]Dead shrub[/size][/b](more realistic and less shiny)
[b][size=3]Tundra Cotton[/size][/b](toned down the brightness and adjusted the color)
[b][size=3]Dead Salmon[/size][size=2](better texture and removed glow)[/size]
[/b]
[size=4][color=#b6d7a8]THIS MOD ALSO FIXES THESE GRASSES FROM VERDANT:[/color]
[/size]-EspFern01
-EspFern02
-EspFern03
-EspFernbraken01
-EspFernbraken02
-forestgrass01
-EspBogBean02Leaves


[size=3]
[/size][b][size=3]ALSO added mountain flower fix!! (download from optionals)
A fix for Verdant glowing plants is available in optinals.
[/size][color=#d9ead3][size=6]Compatibility:[/size][/color]
This mod is compatible with just about every mod there is.
Just make sure to install it last and override all.
[color=#d9ead3][size=6]Installation:
[/size][/color]
[size=3]manual:[/size]
[size=3]1.Install HD Plants and Herbs[/size]
[size=3]2.Download my mod[/size]
[size=3]3.Unzip my file and copy the "data" folder[/size]
[size=3]4.Place it in you skyrim directory(if asked to replace files say yes)[/size]
[size=3]or install with NMM[/size]

[color=#b6d7a8][size=4]I'm planning on fixing these in the future:[/size][/color]
[size=3]tree branches[/size]
[size=3]yellow bones [/size]
[size=3]Ingredients[/size]
[size=3]dead animals[/size]
[size=3]Creatures[/size]
[size=3] [/size]

[color=#d9ead3][size=6]Recommended:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499][/url][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499][/url][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]E[/url][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#d9ead3][size=3][/size][/color][/b][b][size=3][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]NB parti[/url][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]cle patch[/url][color=#fff2cc](fixes glowy objects caused by ENB)
[/color][/size][/b][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url][color=#fff2cc](used in screenshots)
[/color][/b][b][color=#fff2cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant[/url](Download fix in optionals)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1546/?]Hd plants and herbs[/url](HIGHLY RECOMMENDED)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3621/?] Animal and Creature Pack[/url](Fixes some glowing animal textures)[/color][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?][b][color=#fff2cc]
[/color][/b]
[/url][/size][/center][center][b]
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1546/?]
[/url][/center][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1546/?]


[/url][/size][center][b]
[/b]If you want me to fix some other glowing plants or textures please post a comment.[/center]
author: Bogidarst
